name: Squiddy Bot
description:
Squiddy Bot crash landed in the subterranean depths of a chilly liquid planet. Guide your little biomechanical friend to rendezvous with its Space Pod.

Arrow Keys = Left / Right
Space = Liquid Helium Propulsion

Squiddy Bot has a very sturdy helmet which protects its sensitive positronic brain. Don't worry about anything. That helmet is securely fastened, offering 100% protection. You'll guide Squiddy Bot with no problems at all...

...unless by some unimaginable circumstance in which the helmet comes off, exposing its delicate neural network mind. I don't even want to think of what could happen if the helmet somehow fell off - just one head bump against  any surface could result in a catastrophic electrostatic headache!
